nodes.text: Zygian's Banking Concern was a corporation in control of several financial businesses, including Zygian Savings and Loan. It was headquartered on Treylon II. A branch office could be found in Mos Eisley, on Tatooine. The concern promised their customers a profitable life as moisture farmers on Tatooine, but in reality farmers could work their entire life and never come close to paying off their loans.
